definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: From Dong Chang Road Ferry Station to SBM will take only 10 minutes by walk.
sentences.chinese: 从东昌路轮渡码头至正大广场步行只需10分钟。

sentences.english: He rode the ferry over, and I knew him the moment I saw him.
sentences.chinese: 他乘坐了轮渡过来，当我看到他的一瞬间就认出了他。

sentences.english: The cross- Chan-enl ferries are a quick and convenient means of sending goods across to the Continent.
sentences.chinese: 跨海轮渡是把货物送往欧洲大陆的最快捷方便的办法。

sentences.english: The locals had no choice but to agree. Mastu's home locates in the ferry terminal area of Meizhou Island.
sentences.chinese: 妈祖的老家就在现在湄洲岛的轮渡码头一带。

sentences.english: He crossed on the ferry to San Francisco and made his way to an employment office.
sentences.chinese: 他坐轮渡到了旧金山，去到一家职业介绍所。

sentences.english: You can take a ferry or subway there.
sentences.chinese: 您可以乘坐水面轮渡及园区内地铁过江。

sentences.english: To make ends meet, Fok worked as a labourer at the airport and shovelled coal onto ferries.
sentences.chinese: 为了生计霍先生干过机场搬运工和轮渡铲煤工。

sentences.english: Ferries take visitors to both Ellis Island and Liberty Island, where the Statue of Liberty stands.
sentences.chinese: 轮渡可带游客到埃利斯岛和自由女神所矗立的自由岛。

sentences.english: Can I take a ferry to cross the river?
sentences.chinese: 你问对方可以乘轮渡过江吗？

sentences.english: Ferry and other transportation services on sea have also been suspended in Qingdao.
sentences.chinese: 青岛轮渡和其它海上交通也全部暂停。

definition: a pier/a landing-stage/a loading trestle for goods or passengers/a platform
to embark/to travel by ship/to ferry
light rail/transit system (underground, at street level or elevated)/streetcar/metro/abbr. for 輕型軌道交通|轻型轨道交通[qing1 xing2 gui3 dao4 jiao1 tong1]
Gulangyu, scenic island off Xiamen 廈門|厦门[Xia4 men2]
public transportation/mass transit/abbr. for 公共交通[gong1 gong4 jiao1 tong1]
